bug.question: I have six legs and I love to march. I often carry crumbs from your lunch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🧺 I might be found at a picnic.

bug.question: I have beautiful wings and love to flutter. I start as a caterpillar and become a....fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I visit flowers.
🐛 I used to crawl.
🌈 I come in many colours.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger, so be careful if I arrive. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz.
🍯 I make a sweet treat.
🌻 I collect pollen.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and bring good luck, or so they say! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round.
🌱 I eat aphids in the garden.
⚫ I have dots.

bug.question: I chirp loudly at night, especially in the summer. I have long legs for jumping. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am green or brown.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌾 You can find me in fields.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. When I'm scared, I roll myself into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I live under rocks and logs.
⚽ I can roll up.
🏘️ I am not an insect.

bug.question: I build my home in a spiral shape, but I am not a nautilus. I eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 Gardeners don't like me very much.

bug.question: I can walk on water, and I skate on ponds so clear. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't sink.
⛸️ It looks like I'm skating.
🍃 I am very light.

bug.question: I’m a bug that’s known to bite, especially when it’s dark at night. I can spread disease with my nasty bites. What am I?

hints.text: 💉 I suck blood.
🦟 I have a high pitched whine.
☀️ Dawn and dusk are my favourite times.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my prey. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am an arachnid.
🕷️ Some people are afraid of me.
🏡 I can be found in corners and attics.

ocean.question: I have many colors and live in the sea. Fish swim around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be soft or hard.
🏡 Many sea creatures live in me.
✨ I am a living thing that adds beauty to the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish that some people are scared of, but I actually eat tiny sea creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 People sometimes see my fin in the water.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I am an ocean predator.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the seabed. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my home on my back.
🥗 I like to eat plants on the ocean floor.
🏠 I am a mollusk.

ocean.question: I am a huge wave caused by an earthquake under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can cause great damage to coastal areas.
🌊 My name comes from Japanese.
💥 I happen after something shakes.

ocean.question: I'm a creature with eight arms that can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live under the sea.
🎨 I use ink as defense.
🤫 I can squeeze in tight places.

ocean.question: I'm a type of rock that is made from the skeletons of tiny sea creatures.

hints.text: ⚪ I am often white or light-colored.
🧱 I can be used to build things.
🐚 Many old shells are inside me.

ocean.question: I am a long chain of islands in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I am formed by volcanoes.
🌋 I can be found in the Pacific Ocean.
🌴 Hawaii is one of me.

ocean.question: I am a very small, shrimp-like animal that many whales eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🦐 I am a crustacean.
🐳 Many baleen whales filter me from the water.
❄️ I am abundant in the Arctic and Antarctic oceans.

ocean.question: I am a deep crack in the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am the deepest part of the ocean.
🔦 Exploring me requires special equipment.
🗻 I am formed by tectonic plates.

ocean.question: I am the measure of salt in the ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 It affects how dense the water is.
💧 I am higher in some oceans than others.
🌡️ I change depending on evaporation and rainfall.
